title: How many words would be standard in a chapter in a book? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends completely on the book and the editor. Some editors prefer longer chapters; some prefer shorter. Some topics lend themselves to short (1,000 or 2,000 word) chapters; others longer.
Chapter one. Your chapters should be as long as they need to be to cover the topic thoroughly. No more, no less.  The end.
